email_body: Thx for the spreadsheet. 2 questions : What time frame does this entail and does the correlation between the trader and AGG GAS include that trader's contribution to the floor's P&L. In other words, is my P&L correlated with the floor or is it correlated to the rest of the floor absent me? Enron North America Corp. From: Frank Hayden @ ENRON 09/19/2000 02:41 PM To: John Arnold/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Subject:
